front end engineer

not just another iron yard grad

Hey, I'm Rosie!

As a graphic designer, I found joy in making mundane things like textbooks beautiful (or at least tolerable!). But I found my desire to make things beautiful extended to the online world more than the print world. So I enrolled in The Iron Yard with the belief that with my background in design and this intensive 12-week bootcamp, I could make a difference in how users interact with websites.

What I Know

Programming allows me to do more than simply make a website beautiful: it allows me to make websites functional and easy to interact with. This is my passion. I continue to grow as a programmer, learning new languages, expanding my current knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and implementing what I have learned in a unique and efficient way.
